name: Shale Shores
description:
Explore the cliffs of Shale Shores as a cartographer named Stella on an island called PogGeologyland in the middle of the Pacific Ocean. A nice warm campfire awaits you at the top of the mountain. The path to the top is an adventure for only you to decide.

Don't be frustrated if you fall! This game is meant to be a chill vibe.

Controls

Mouse - Look

W - Move forward/Climb up

S - Climb Down

A/D - Move Sideways (Only in Midair)

Left Shift - Hold to initiate climb

Extras:

R - Reset (In case you glitch out)

Escape/Menu - Pause 

Physics engine is a little scrappy so odd behavior may occur once in a while.

 Tips and Tricks

-If you are lost go towards the big gray mountain.

- Stella can only climb ~5 seconds at a time. You can reset this time by touching your feet on ground.

- You can slow a fall with climbing to prevent falling to death.

- While falling you can strafe left and right with A/D and move your camera with the mouse.

-Make sure to try to align parallel to the wall for the easiest climbing.

Attributions:

-Big shout out to Kenny.NL for the amazing low poly assets. 

-All fonts were Google Fonts

-All other assets were created by me.

Built with Unity, Soundtrap, Cakewalk by Bandlab, Audacity, Krita, Davinci Resolve, Mixamo, Fuse, and lots of caffeine (Turnip needs to get some sleep).
